entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain or snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
